  • Method Details

    • createAuction

      public BeanAuction createAuction(BeanUser seller, String name, String description, double startingBid, LocalDateTime startTime, LocalDateTime endTime, Boolean ended)
      Creates a new auction and saves it to the database.
      Parameters:
      seller - The user who is selling the item.
      name - The name of the auction.
      description - The description of the auction.
      startingBid - The starting bid of the auction.
      startTime - The start time of the auction.
      endTime - The end time of the auction.
      ended - The status of whether the auction has ended.
      Returns:
      The created BeanAuction object.

    • loadAuctionsFromDatabase

      public ArrayList<BeanAuction> loadAuctionsFromDatabase()
      Loads all auctions from the database.
      Returns:
      A list of loaded auctions.

    • updateAuctionInDatabase

      public void updateAuctionInDatabase(BeanAuction auction, LocalDateTime startTime, LocalDateTime endTime)
      Updates an auction's start and end times in the database.
      Parameters:
      auction - The auction to be updated.
      startTime - The new start time of the auction.
      endTime - The new end time of the auction.

    • getActiveAuctions

      public ArrayList<BeanAuction> getActiveAuctions()
      Gets a list of active auctions.
      Returns:
      A list of active auctions.

    • searchAuctions

      public ArrayList<BeanAuction> searchAuctions(String searchCriteria)
      Searches for auctions based on search criteria.
      Parameters:
      searchCriteria - The criteria to search for.
      Returns:
      A list of matching auctions.

    • getAuctionsByUser

      public ArrayList<BeanAuction> getAuctionsByUser(BeanUser user)
      Gets a list of auctions created by a specific user.
      Parameters:
      user - The user whose auctions are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of auctions created by the specified user.

    • displayAuctionDetails

      public void displayAuctionDetails(BeanAuction auction)
      Displays the details of an auction.
      Parameters:
      auction - The auction whose details are to be displayed.
